chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;
items.plainText: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;

items.text: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.
items.plainText: Preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.

items.text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;
items.plainText: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;

items.text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.
items.plainText: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.

items.text: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.
items.plainText: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.

items.text: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.
items.plainText: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.

items.text: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:
items.plainText: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:

items.text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.
items.plainText: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.

items.text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:
items.plainText: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:

items.text: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.
items.plainText: For Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.

items.text: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.
items.plainText: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.

items.text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.
items.plainText: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.

items.text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.
items.plainText: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.

items.text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:
items.plainText: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:

items.text: Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.
items.plainText: Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.

items.text: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.
items.plainText: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.

items.text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.
items.plainText: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

items.text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
items.plainText: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

items.text: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.
items.plainText: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.

items.text: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.
items.plainText: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.

items.text: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.
items.plainText: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.

items.text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.
items.plainText: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.
